# timeZone

**Instance Property**

The time zone used to create and parse date representations.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeZone: TimeZone { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default time zone is Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

## Modifying an ISO 8601 Format Style

- **dateSeparator**: The character used to separate the components of a date.
- **dateTimeSeparator**: The character used to separate the date and time components of an ISO 8601 string representation of a date.
- **dateTimeSeparator(_:)**: Sets the character that specifies the date and time components.
